description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Reporting to: S&M Director/General Director
              

              Responsibilities
              
              •	Focus on sales efforts/ leasing activities.
              
              •	Responsible for marketing and making sales/marketing calls, presentations and follow-ups to build-up pipelines, especially Vietnamese companies and MNCs already in Vietnam.
              
              •	Listen to customer requirements and present appropriately solutions to make deal.
              
              •	Deep understanding of market in demand/supply and market price movement
              
              •	Monitor identified competitors’ activities
              
              •	Plan and monitor budgets on income and expenses related
              
              •	Prepare proposals, rental quotations/letter of offers for lease and sale agreements
              
              •	Engage in lease/sales negotiations and monitor the execution of the Tenancy Agreement/Supplement or Sales Contract
              
              •	To implement Key Account Management (KAM)
              
              •	Handle after-sales services, liaise with tenants to understand their business plan and requirement
              
              •	Co-ordinate with Property Management Dept to ensure smooth handover and takeover of premises
              
              •	The above listing is not exhaustive & therefore not final. These job descriptions serve as a general guideline and future additions or changes on the assignments are to be anticipated.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Bachelor’s Degree in Estate Management, Business Administration, or its equivalent.
              
              - Good command both of English and Vietnamese writing and speaking skills.
              
              - Proficiency with MS Office application.
              
              - At least 5 years’ experience in Office Leasing.
